mapper.sql: lci.ID, lci.CASE_NO, lci.CASE_XK_NO,lci.CASE_XK_ANO, lci.CASE_NAME,lci.ENTRUSTMENT_TYPE, lci.CASE_DATETIME, lci.CASE_LOCATION, lci.CASE_LOCATION_DESC, lci.CASE_BRIEF, lci.CASE_TYPE, lci.CASE_PROPERTY, lci.CASE_LEVEL, lci.CASE_SPECIAL_REMARK, lci.CASE_STATUS, lci.INSTORED_FLAG, lci.CREATE_DATETIME, lci.CREATE_PERSON, lci.UPDATE_DATETIME, lci.UPDATE_PERSON, lci.DELETE_FLAG, lci.JIAJI_FLAG, lci.REMARK
mapper.select:
select
from lims_case_info lci where lci.ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and DELETE_FLAG='0'

select
from lims_case_info lci where lci.CASE_NO = #{caseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and lci.DELETE_FLAG='0'

select
from lims_case_info lci where lci.CASE_XK_NO = #{caseXkNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and lci.DELETE_FLAG='0'

select
from lims_case_info lci, lims_consignment lc where lc.CASE_ID=lci.ID and lc.ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and lc.DELETE_FLAG='0'

sql.if: and exists (select lib.case_id from LIMS_IDENTIFY_BOOK lib where lib.CASE_ID=lci.ID and STATUS=#{identifyBookStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and (lc.DELEGATOR1 like CONCAT('%', #{delegatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') or lc.DELEGATOR2 like CONCAT('%', #{delegatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))

mapper.select:
SELECT substring(lci.CASE_NO, 5, 4) as caseNo1, lpad(substring_index(lci.CASE_NO, '-', -1),4,'0000') as caseNo2, , lc.ID as CONSIGNMENT_ID, lc.DELEGATE_ORG, lc.DELEGATE_DATETIME, lc.DELEGATOR1, lc.DELEGATOR2, lc.ADDITIONAL_FLAG, lc.ACCEPTOR, lc.ACCEPT_DATETIME, lc.REFUSE_REASON as REFUSE_REASON, di_1.dict_name as CASE_TYPE_NAME, di_2.dict_name as CASE_PROPERTY_NAME, di_3.dict_name as CASE_LEVEL_NAME, di_4.dict_name as CASE_STATUS_NAME, do.org_name as DELEGATE_ORG_NAME from lims_consignment lc left join delegate_org do on do.org_code=lc.delegate_org, lims_case_info lci left join dict_item di_1 on lci.CASE_TYPE=di_1.dict_code and di_1.DICT_TYPE_CODE='CASE_TYPE' left join dict_item di_2 on lci.CASE_PROPERTY=di_2.dict_code and di_2.DICT_TYPE_CODE='CASE_PROPERTY' left join dict_item di_3 on lci.CASE_LEVEL=di_3.dict_code and di_3.DICT_TYPE_CODE='CASE_LEVEL' left join dict_item di_4 on lci.CASE_STATUS=di_4.dict_code and di_4.DICT_TYPE_CODE='CASE_STATUS' where lci.ID=lc.CASE_ID and lci.DELETE_FLAG='0' and lc.DELETE_FLAG='0'
order by ${orderByClause}
order by lc.CREATE_DATETIME DESC
order by lc.CREATE_DATETIME DESC

SELECT from lims_case_info lci ,lims_consignment lc where lci.ID = lc.CASE_ID and lc.DELEGATE_DATETIME >= '2019-04-01' and lci.CASE_XK_NO like '%K522%' AND lci.DELETE_FLAG = '0' AND lc.DELETE_FLAG = '0' and lci.CASE_XK_ANO is null
SELECT count(lc.ID) from lims_consignment lc, lims_case_info lci where lci.ID=lc.CASE_ID and lci.DELETE_FLAG='0' and lc.DELETE_FLAG='0' and lci.ENTRUSTMENT_TYPE is null
SELECT count(lc.ID) from lims_consignment lc, lims_case_info lci where lci.ID=lc.CASE_ID and lci.DELETE_FLAG='0' and lc.DELETE_FLAG='0'
SELECT count(lc.ID) from lims_consignment lc, lims_case_info lci where lci.ID=lc.CASE_ID and lci.DELETE_FLAG='0' and lc.DELETE_FLAG='0'
mapper.insert: insert into lims_case_info (CASE_NO, CASE_XK_NO,CASE_XK_ANO,ENTRUSTMENT_TYPE, CASE_NAME, CASE_DATETIME, CASE_LOCATION, CASE_LOCATION_DESC, CASE_BRIEF, CASE_TYPE, CASE_PROPERTY, CASE_LEVEL, CASE_SPECIAL_REMARK, CASE_STATUS, INSTORED_FLAG, CREATE_PERSON,UPDATE_PERSON, JIAJI_FLAG, REMARK) values (#{caseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseXkNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{caseXkAno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{entrustmentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{caseLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseLocationDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseBrief,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseProperty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseSpecialRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{instoredFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jiajiFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update lims_case_info set CASE_NO = #{caseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENTRUSTMENT_TYPE = #{entrustmentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASE_XK_NO = #{caseXkNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASE_NAME = #{caseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASE_DATETIME = #{caseDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CASE_LOCATION = #{caseLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASE_LOCATION_DESC = #{caseLocationDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASE_BRIEF = #{caseBrief,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASE_TYPE = #{caseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASE_PROPERTY = #{caseProperty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASE_LEVEL = #{caseLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASE_SPECIAL_REMARK = #{caseSpecialRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASE_STATUS = #{caseStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INSTORED_FLAG = #{instoredFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, UPDATE_PERSON = #{updatePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, JIAJI_FLAG = #{jiajiFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select t.id as caseId, c.id as consignmentId, c.consignment_no as consignmentNo, t.case_xk_no as caseXkNo, t.case_status as caseStatus, c.delegate_org as delegateOrg, c.delegate_org_desc as delegateOrgName, c.delegate_datetime as delegateDatetime, from lims_case_info t,lims_consigment_info c where t.id=c.case_id and t.case_datetime>=date_format('2019-01-01','%Y-%m-%d') and t.CASE_XK_NO !='æ— ' and t.CASE_XK_NO like 'K5224%'
